website_summaries.verdict: A good all-around BMX tire with the right balance between traction and rolling efficiency.
pros: Flexible tire compound makes it easy to fit it onto most 20-inch BMX rims
Light block tread is staggered for the best combination of grip and speed, making it appropriate for most BMX parks
Budget-friendly for beginners and professionals alike
cons: Not suitable for off-roading or bad weather conditions

customer_reviews.title: Tire exploded while mounting, defective bead...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two tires and both tread patterns are completely different. As I was installing the first tire I noticed the bead was not seated correctly and was coming off the rim. I deflated the tire to attempt to seat the bead on the rim again before the whole tire popped off and the inner tube exploded like a balloon. I had only inflated the tire to 30PSI before it blew up... I have requested a refund and will purchase a better quality tire, I would not want to be stranded miles away from home with these tires. Again, please be careful when installing this tire and inspect the bead before mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetic, shipped with a few blemishes
customer_reviews.text: A picture's worth a thousand words. It looks great from about 3 feet away but there are a few black glue strips on the tires. For the price they are a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: AlienFunbug

customer_reviews.title: Super grippy, half the cost of my usual 20' tires
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad Goodyear has gotten into the bicycle tire business! I have a 3-wheeled cargo trike with two 20' tires in the front as a daily rider and I go through about three pairs of 30$ schwalbes a year. I ordered these in the heat of a flat tire emergency and I'm so glad I did. The white ones shipped 1 day and were easy to install. As BMX tires they are WAY stickier/grippier/gummy than what I had on before. I think this adds some drag but they do well in rain and have taken lot of pothole beating in the last month with no signs of wear or puncture.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Douglass

customer_reviews.title: why would Goodyear [ut their name on this
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality, when looking at the construction it appears that there are areas on the tire which are thinner then others. When I installed it I had an issue which others have reported, the bead popped of the rim, I had to let the air out and reset it, while holding it in place. I only put this on a utility cart so not too concerned, no way would I put this on a bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Friend

customer_reviews.title: Low quality.  Less than 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.text: One month of use. I replaced tires on my daughter's bike for her birthday. In one month of light wear (no tricks, stunts, or long distance rides) the inners tube popped out of the side of the tire. We used proper inflation, measurements, and the protective band because we wanted the bike to last -- and it didn't even make it through the summer. We're really upset.
customer_reviews.author: Bayleaf

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires, silly Amazon purchase limit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Installed with no issues. Only what is up with Amazon only allowing you to purchase one tire per day? Last time I checked most bicycles have two tires. I had to order over two days and that only increased shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Turner

customer_reviews.title: Tread look amazing!
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice tires. I pumped them up to 40psi, which is a median between the 35 to 60psi, for me. I've never needed a tired that went above 35psi. But now that I'm going to be BMX racing, they should work really well! The tread looks amazing, and should grip the dirt well! Then again off the dirt, they look like they will grip amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Get some miles on these tires
customer_reviews.text: Tire is of great quality and has lasted me several hundred miles already this year. The tire tread feels great on a smooth surface and still has great traction on a dirt trail and wet surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C.

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bike perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bicycle to keep at our house for the grandkids and it had one new white Tire with rubber nuns still on it and one that was worn smooth. This tire fit perfectly and the bike looks brand new, and is much safer
customer_reviews.author: Woodsie79

customer_reviews.title: Good tread, folding bicycle tire, good value
customer_reviews.text: Tire had good tread and arrived in good shape. It met the description of the manufacturer, in my opinion. It is a folding bicycle tire that arrived in a cardboard box from the Good Year company, and that box was within a larger box that also held products that I had ordered. This tire is black walled on the outside and states a psi of 35 to 60, which is exactly what I need for my bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dave

customer_reviews.title: BMX be stylin'
customer_reviews.text: Who wants black tires that blend into the pavement? These all white tires look super dope gliding across the blacktop. Tight tread patterns keep the ride smooth and the flex bead makes for easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wanamaker

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peezy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two tubes and two tires for grandsons bike. Put then right on, inflated the tubes and off he went. No issues. Easy Peezy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like expected, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughters bike, it fits great and almost matches the original tire that's on the rear. No problems. I have no idea how the heck they got the tire folded up into that little box though! Folding didn't bother it one bit once I unpacked it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Made my Daughter Bicycle look Brand New. Got rid of dried out black tires. She was So excited. Thought it was a new bike !! Happy Dad !!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good tire for paved trails
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my kid's bikes. Lower resistance thank stock knobby tires. Makes it easier to pedal farther and faster.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for Specialized BMX type bike
customer_reviews.text: Was nearly perfect visual match for the stock tire which I was not replacing, including tread pattern. Non-metal beads easily returned to round shape with minimal effort after unpacking. Seated uniformly on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: William Stoker

customer_reviews.title: GOOD RUBBER
customer_reviews.text: The tires were great. Good quality and the fit was perfect. I put them on a log carrier that had worn out rotted tires, now it works like brand new>
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lane

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grip very well
customer_reviews.text: Alright tire for kids learning to ride, or the slow riding cruiser, but definitely not a bmx racing tire. It's slippery when turning sharp and fast and wants to slide. Doesn't grip very well.
customer_reviews.author: John Durham

customer_reviews.title: Cool tires. Cooler price.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool tires for an even cooler price! My oldest daughter is learning to ride and I figured I'd get my old BMX bike in shape so we can ride together. I'm very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Does Things

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to fix my sons bike. Arrived quickly and saved us a trip to the bike shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Worksman Trifecta trike. The tread pattern I received was different than what is advertised, but I liked it just the same. I upgraded my original size of 20 x 1.75 to 20 x 2.125 for a smoother ride and they served my purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tire for my daughter's BMX Bike
customer_reviews.text: If you don't ride your BMX that hard or just starting riding...this will definitely be a nice upgrade as a replacement BMX tire. .
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Bike replacement tire did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Tire arrived quickly and was exactly as described. Replaced tire in 15 minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: Ideas&Opins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tires!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. First time I have ever changed tires on a bike. I got two of the same model. I saw some reviews mention that they got two different treads. The bike rides awesome and it feels like I can get a little more speed with these tires. Very smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Tread pattern issue.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these tires but got two different tread patterns. Although the boxes were identical, the tires were not. Only one was the tread pattern displayed in the picture. I didn't realize this, of course,until I had put the wrong one on. So if you are buying more than one, make sure the tread pattern is correct before you put the tire on.
customer_reviews.author: Pat in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Tires fit perfectly.  Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The tires fit the bike perfectly. Were easy to install once I purchased the proper tool. Be sure you have a good inner tube since the tires are not tubeless. My only complaint is that the two tires I purchased came with different tread patterns.
customer_reviews.author: A. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Soft to install, would recommend replace tube with this tires, so you go worry free for several months.
customer_reviews.author: FEB

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tire for a kids BMX bike and it's better than the original tire.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE JENSEN

customer_reviews.title: Decent but was sent 2 different tread patterns even know ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent but was sent 2 different tread patterns even know the barcodes with the same. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: GCHPRIME

customer_reviews.title: It's white!
customer_reviews.text: Good thick tire, should be very resistant to flats. And it's white to match my whole theme.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for price
customer_reviews.text: As described; lightly inflate tube to gain shape of tire, as they’re shipped folded flat.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Trusted quality
customer_reviews.text: Got my daughters bike beautifully, and appear to be well built- by a trusted brand. Like em so far (<1week)
customer_reviews.author: Ebiri

customer_reviews.title: Low price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight tire. Good traction...wears quickly. If your kid skids a lot you may want to spend more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a year and they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Ammon McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Actually are Innova tires but did match and seem grippy/fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually are Innova tires but did match and seem grippy/fresh rubber. It is a black tire painted white on the outside so will see how is wears.
customer_reviews.author: Alex BB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires fair price.
customer_reviews.text: tires are excellent! Brought my son's back back to life. like it's brand new again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Black

customer_reviews.title: 2.0 not 2.125
customer_reviews.text: These are 20 x 2 not 20 x 2.125 or they would've got 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Nick Defoe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: These tires were a similar price to ones I found locally but these are much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hollye Long

customer_reviews.title: Wheel had a tear
customer_reviews.text: Love the wheels had a tear on the side, so when the inside of the wheel keep coming loose. They probably Stretch the wheel to match which caused a tear. We realize that it was loose when we placed on the, but didn’t think much of it. Make sure to check the wheel before placing it on!
customer_reviews.author: sthefany

customer_reviews.title: Look like good tires but I ordered 2 same tire and ...
customer_reviews.text: Look like good tires but I ordered 2 same tire and I got 2 different tread patterns. Not sure why. It only shows 1 tire per color when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: ATA77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tire, good value. Have purchased 2, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave, Boston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price, excellent quality what is not to like? Holding up well on the hay cart which works hard daily.
customer_reviews.author: LStC

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Tire for the best price.
customer_reviews.text: Hold their hand grips to the road. Just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is great, but I ordered 2 tires and when they ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is great, but I ordered 2 tires and when they arrived the tires had 2 different tread patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Boring

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my 7 year old’s bike. Easy to install, high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Goldmann

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to put on a pony cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and look great
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how good of quality these tires are. These are thicker rubber than most tires. They look amazing as well. I will by these again!
customer_reviews.author: JimmyPH

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this. The inner tube is stronger than this tires what a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Snow white, easy to install. Riding and breaking is great!
customer_reviews.author: Riad Guliyev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great service & good product nothing in the world like a child's smile!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the look had to replace my brakes because you still use my foot in the back tire to stop but these tires did not like that one bit
customer_reviews.author: conner brewer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: my son didn't want a new bike, just wanted new tires, Installed in 20 min without any problem. Hes smooth riding! Happy teen.
customer_reviews.author: David Serwatka

customer_reviews.title: Absolute quality
customer_reviews.text: My son decided to make his bike old school and these tires did the trick! Fast shipping and great tires.
customer_reviews.author: Candi M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking tire!
customer_reviews.text: The tire is very nice looking and described beautifully. The seller is very prompt and the price is great! Great service
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Not only do they give you tread for traction but they look sweet doing it!!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet looking tires at an affordable price! Don’t get me started on the quality!! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Attention to detail is not very good
customer_reviews.text: Order two of the exact same thing but get one thing that's just a little bit different than the other
customer_reviews.author: chris kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Boxed Goodyear Tires
customer_reviews.text: Folding tires took proper shape immediately after unpacking, fit great.
customer_reviews.author: SKY FLASH

customer_reviews.title: Nicely shipped, no problems with sidewalls when mounting
customer_reviews.text: Nicely shipped, no problems with sidewalls when mounting.. thick tread and thin walls, be sure you dont run low tire pressure. The white lettering should be on both sides though.
customer_reviews.author: Tye Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the tires but thought it came as a pair. I had to order a second tire to replace both.
customer_reviews.author: weird

customer_reviews.title: The tires work
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I can that is bad a out the tires
customer_reviews.author: Impact 67

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking tyres, suits my 1976 Chopper , will purchase more !
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Barnes

customer_reviews.title: If you order two they are not the same tread???
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of the exact same tire and they had different treads so do not match??
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: The good- The tire fit like a glove and my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: The good- The tire fit like a glove and my son loves it. The bad- Amazon will only allow you to buy 1 tire. This is crap as we needed both so I found the other at Wal-Mart. Amazon, you would have gotten 5 stars if you didn't restrict users from buying 1 tire.
customer_reviews.author: VAreviews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install by hand without lever tools
customer_reviews.text: Comes packaged folded up in a small box. It unfolded and fit on the rim perfectly. It was not the same tread design as shown in the items images on wheel it was like the tread pictured in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J

customer_reviews.title: Avoid! Won't stay on rim above 25 PSI.
customer_reviews.text: Seems you can't buy anything that works anymore. The PSI is supposed to be 45-60. I can't put any more that 25 or the tire pops off the rim. Very poor fit, poor quality. Sidewalls have very little rigidity. I would not buy these again nor would I recommend them for anyone or anything. I would say it's a fluke but I bought two tires and they both do the same thing. Update: it pops off at 25 PSI, too.
customer_reviews.author: John French

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tire is thin on rubber but no defects and works good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I know Good year to be a good tire
customer_reviews.text: I know Good year to be a good tire, however, this tire is exact opposite of every thing good stand for. This tire don't worth a penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sheriff Mustapha Jallow

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids bikes
customer_reviews.text: Good for a small kids bike. Don’t recommend for big kids bike. Not very strong. If it’s for a kid under 12 then you’re good.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

product_meta.title: Goodyear Folding Bead BMX Bike Tire, 20" x 2.125"
product_meta.description: Replace your old bike tires with these Goodyear bicycle tires featuring a folding bead. Rugged and tough, these bicycle tires are built to last.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
